Class AppFrame

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, AppMediator, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, ResourceManager, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, TaskMonitor, javax.swing.WindowConstants, java.awt.event.WindowListener
public class AppFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, AppMediator, java.awt.event.WindowListener, ResourceManager, TaskMonitor

configFile

viewFrameMap

protected java.util.Map viewFrameMap
The map for associating a DBView object with its respective internal frame.

iconMap

protected java.util.Map iconMap
List of ImageIcon objects.

lafMap

protected java.util.Map lafMap
List of LAF sorted by name.

dbViewClasses

protected java.util.Map dbViewClasses
List of all the db view names that are known. This list will be loaded from the config file on startup.

dbList

protected java.util.List dbList
List of currently opened databases. Each db can have a separate view associated with it. This is the list of all individual database sessions.

dbViewList

protected java.util.List dbViewList
List of views that can extract information from the database. So far the only views that are associated with a database are 1) Query Windows 2) Service Windows 3) Network Discovery Windows

dbConnector

protected DatabaseConnector dbConnector
The task in which the database connection happens.
